meanings.definition: A fight between two professional boxers for a prize or money.
meanings.sent1: The prizefight ended with one boxer winning a trophy.
meanings.sent2: Fans gathered to watch the exciting prizefight between the two boxers.
meanings.sent3: During the prizefight, the boxers accidentally bumped into each other comically.
meanings.sent4: The intensity of the prizefight was like a clash of titans in the ring.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered loudly as the prizefight reached its climax.

meanings.sent1: He trained hard to prizefight against the champion boxer.
meanings.sent2: The boxer decided to prizefight for the championship title.
meanings.sent3: She challenged her friend to playfully prizefight in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The two rivals were set to prizefight under the bright lights of the arena.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's determination to prizefight was evident in every punch thrown.
